modName: Pirateborn - Menu And Main Theme Replacer
summary: This replacer is made for true pirates of Skyrim. It has two versions of pirate-like main menu replacers and the Skyrim main theme on simple pirate-like instruments.
descriptionHtml:
Greetings!

This replacer is made for true pirates of Skyrim. It has two versions of pirate-like main menu replacers and the Skyrim main theme on simple pirate-like instruments.

Bon Voyage!

INSTALLATION:
Extract the files to your Skyrim directory.
author: Silverloom
